DbDetails.DbTable: mymeal.mymeal_income m left join mymeal.mymeal_incomeaccount m0 on m.accountid=m0.accountid left join mymeal.mymeal_incomemethod m1 on m.methodname=m1.incomemethodid left join mymeal.mymeal_enum m2 on m.statusid=m2.enumkey left join mymeal.mymeal_entrytype m3 on m.entrytypeid=m3.entrytypeid left join mymeal.mymeal_diningbill m4 on m.billno=m4.billid left join mymeal.mymeal_department m5 on m.departmentid=m5.departmentid left join mymeal.mymeal_employee m6 on m.employeeid=m6.employeeid left join mymeal.mymeal_userlogin m7 on m.operatorid=m7.userloginid left join mymeal.mymeal_userlogin m8 on m.checkerid=m8.userloginid
DbDetails.Data: m.docno,m0.Name accountid,m1.Name methodname,m2.EnumValue statusid,m3.Name entrytypeid,m.docdate,m4.DocNo billno,m5.Name departmentid,m6.Name employeeid,m7.LoginName operatorid,m8.LoginName checkerid,m.notes,m.isdelete,m.deletetime,m.incomeid
